name: Insomniacs Get Some Sleep
description:
Fall asleep in 60 seconds.

A game about how we fight sleep, yet have not control over our ability to stay awake or fall asleep.

Goal: Find food, stay awake

  • Stay awake by eating food and drinking caffeine
  • Explore you an island
  • Find notes and left behind items from other travellers
  • Relax and enjoy the 60 seconds of sun as it sweeps across the sky

How to play:

  • Mouse and keyboard to move, shift to run
  • 'E' to pickup items
  • 'TAB' to open inventory
  • 'Right click' to use items

Made by The Appreciative Minimalist in 48 hours
